description.value: A half-dragon's blood is dark red, but has a slight metallic sheen. The blood has many magical properties and is valued in the magic community. Alchemists may be able to create concoctions that duplicate a half-dragon's abilities. Use: As an action, a creature can may drink the vial of half-dragon blood. For the next 10 minutes, that creature gains the same type of damage resistance of the half-dragon it was taken from.
